content: There is nothing happens to any person but what was in his power to go through with.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

content: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today.

content: Interestingly, according to modern astronomers, space is finite. This is a very comforting thought-- particularly for people who can never remember where they have left things.

content: Don't turn away from possible futures before you're certain you don't have anything to learn from them.
author: Richard Bach

content: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.
author: Thomas Edison

content: Do not give your attention to what others do or fail to do; give it to what you do or fail to do.
author: Dhammapada

content: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more
author: Tony Robbins

content: Once you label me you negate me.

content: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

content: To be aware of a single shortcoming in oneself is more useful than to be aware of a thousand in someone else.

content: There are no failures. Just experiences and your reactions to them.

content: One of the advantages of being disorderly is that one is constantly making exciting discoveries.

content: The friendship that can cease has never been real.

content: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love.

content: There are two kinds of failures: those who thought and never did, and those who did and never thought.

content: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.

content: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

content: Be content with your lot; one cannot be first in everything.

author: Oprah Winfrey
Albert Einstein
content: Gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love. How on earth can you explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love? Put your hand on a stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with that special girl for an hour and it seems like a minute. That's relativity.

author: Everett Dirksen

content: Promises are the uniquely human way of ordering the future, making it predictable and reliable to the extent that this is humanly possible.
author: Hannah Arendt

content: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
author: Pablo Picasso

content: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.

content: Do not be too timid and squeamish about your reactions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.

content: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

content: Only through our connectedness to others can we really know and enhance the self. And only through working on the self can we begin to enhance our connectedness to others.

content: Many sophisticated, intelligent people lack wisdom and common sense.

content: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.

content: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

content: Numberless are the worlds wonders, but none more wonderful than man.

content: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try. The world is beyond the winning.

content: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it.

content: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.

content: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.

content: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.

content: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.

content: A disciplined mind brings happiness.

content: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.

content: Work for something because it is good, not just because it stands a chance to succeed.

content: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

author: Epicurus
